pullRequest.title: Introduce value objects for meta data
pullRequest.bodyText:
Added value objects to represent common meta data instead of using a
generic map.

commit.message:
Introduce value objects for meta data

Added value objects to represent common meta data instead of using a
generic map.

Signed-off-by: Kai Hudalla <kai.hudalla@bosch.io>

nodes.bodyText: I think when it comes to coordinates, there should be a very explicit definition of what the coordinate system is.

nodes.bodyText: Same here, for every metric there should be a clear and explicit definition of the unit of measurement.

nodes.bodyText: I would say, things like this belong into an enum.

commit.message:
Add JavaDocs indicating measurement units and property semantics

Signed-off-by: Kai Hudalla <kai.hudalla@bosch.io>

Add JavaDocs with measurement units to GatewayInfo
